website_summaries.verdict: This plastic tap creates a tight seal that keeps your festive beverages inside your melon.
pros: Comes with tap, coring tool, and instructions
Works with pumpkins and other large fruits, too
cons: Turn tap to the side after dispensing drinks to avoid leaks
Drinks must be very well-blended to come out of the tap spigot without clogging

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders; what a time to be alive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of a video I saw on the facing book about how to put alcohol into a watermelon. It's as easy as it looks. Pro tip: don't carry the watermelon outside without putting it in a bag or something first. I carried it out by hand thinking it was empty. In reality, there was a lot of fluid leftover and it all came spilling out when I chucked it into the trash. Now it looks like I murdered a raccoon while he was asleep in one of the chairs on my front porch. I really should have just thrown it into the shrubs but I didn't want ants. Every day of my life is Hell.
customer_reviews.author: Zap

customer_reviews.title: Nice conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice conversation piece. Make us the day on our summer activities. The faucet attached well to the watermelon and produced a tight and dropless seal on the fruit. Just blend the pulp, pass the blended juice into a colander to remove pieces that can clog the faucet and enjoy a refreshing drink.
customer_reviews.author: Modesto Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Great touch for fun party.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter turned 40 in July. We gave her a huge 40th party. The watermelon keg was a HUGE success. I am so happy I saw it in time to have it for the party. Some people thought that the watermelon was not real that's how good it looked. Loved it, we plan to use it a lot it's so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun with fruit
customer_reviews.text: You can make some really tasty drinks. Get seedless watermelon. The seeds might get stuck in the tap. Let your imagination go. A pumpkin spice drink for Halloween, a honeydew melon punch painted like an Easter egg, who knows what else.
customer_reviews.author: Gean

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a Halloween Party with a pumpkin! Easy to install! Worked perfectly! Hit of the party!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works as adverised! Easy to use and barely any clean up. Just make sure you get a watermelon that will stand upright on its own. This will be a big hit at parties this summer and into the fall with pumpkins!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Beth

customer_reviews.title: Works well, gets compliments
customer_reviews.text: Worked as intended, and better yet everyone complemented it. I don't know why some people are having issues with leaking. I didn't even use the seal (lost it) but didn't have any leaks - you just have to tighten the tap enough, and it's also sturdy enough for a good twist. The clogging speaks for itself - you don't want fruit chunks in the watermelon when using this tap.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, think about display options
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy install worked as advertised. Would recommend that instead of taking a thin slice off the bottom of the watermelon you take that slice off the back side about two inches higher. That way your tap will stand horizontally when you have the watermelon displayed for service
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goff

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the result!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with how the pumpkin keg turned out. This one had the best reviews but it still leaked a little bit. Nothing some plumber's tape couldn't fix, though. Not disappointed at all. Will use the tap again with a watermelon in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tap, watch for seeds clogging the nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: Used this tap over the 4th of July when I made a tipsy bartender blend I had seen on Youtube. Make sure you clean out the watermelon of all seeds as best as you can because we did have issues with this getting clogged and then not able to get it out. It went down to a trickle and in some cases stopped unless we tipped it further forward. Nice tap tho, overall B+
customer_reviews.author: Jayme B. Cabott

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift.
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a white elephant gift. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Santina

customer_reviews.title: Fun conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: This was great to use at my mom's garden party. We used it to serve watermelon fresca. Easy to install. Will get multiple uses. This Halloween I'm making pumpkin juice and will use it again. The only reason it got one star less is I think the material could be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: CatMarcs

customer_reviews.title: As good as it seems
customer_reviews.text: I thought this wouldn’t work. It absolutely did. I made two beer pumpkins for Halloween and these held up with no issue. They were easy to set up and easy to clean. I’ll be reusing them for parties this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Author Sable Sylvan (Heather Davies)

customer_reviews.title: but it will never look good again.
customer_reviews.text: I used it once, and when it was washed almost all the chrome peeled off. It was a hit at the party, but it will never look good again.
customer_reviews.author: Alberta

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Halloween party and was very excited to try it out but when I received the package, it looked like it had been previously opened and then taped shut. This would have been fine except after I took out the tap, it had scratches and water stains all over it like it had been used before. I wasn't even going to write a review because I'm usually too lazy to answer the email but this is just TOO far! I opened it up again to use it today and just realized the coring tool isn't even in the box!!! Very unsatisfied on all fronts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fun, unique gift!
customer_reviews.text: I consider it a fun, unique gift. Recipient seemed to be delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P.

customer_reviews.title: Tap made good seal against the pumpkin
customer_reviews.text: Tap made good seal against the pumpkin, but the spout dripped uncontrollably. Many of my guests tried fiddling with it and trying to adjust it, but nothing worked. We could occasionally get it to "slow down", but that meant 1 cup of liquid dripped through the spout per hour. I returned it and will try again with a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate P.

customer_reviews.title: Liked the idea of getting juice straight from the fruit
customer_reviews.text: This product was ok. Liked the idea of getting juice straight from the fruit. Even after blending the fruit up very well the tap only worked a few times before it was getting clogged. It may work better if the juice you are extracting from the fruit is just regular juice poured into the emptied watermelon.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Had a ton of fun with this on 4th of July
customer_reviews.text: Had a ton of fun with this on 4th of July. Made watermelon margaritas - everyone was impressed. Can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Yeezus is King
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift. Kanye saved my life and it’s a beautiful thing to follow such an important figure and learn from the good he has done for this earth. All praise Yeezus. I used to suffer from addiction. I tried the Bible but it didn’t work. This book is what made the difference. Thank you Mr. West.
customer_reviews.author: McKelvey Bump

customer_reviews.title: The tap itself works great. The one issue
customer_reviews.text: The tap itself works great. The one issue, that they don't mention, is how darn messy the whole process is. So just be prepared for that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Good instructions. Super fun to do for parties
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but not the best. In order for the liquid to come through the tap it has to be VERY watery. This makes it hard to use anything watermelon based. I was happy with how well the seal was
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked great at first but then it started to clog
customer_reviews.text: It worked great at first but then it started to clog. It would be nice if there were a screen to prevent clogging.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bane

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun at a party went through a lot of punch just to use the spigot
customer_reviews.author: shirley walker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, used it for thanksgiving punch. Stuck it in a pumpkin. It was the conversation of the night.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff to use
customer_reviews.text: It's very convenient for me to eat watermelon. It's also good to use. It's easy to operate. There are more ways to eat watermelon. I can experience the taste of watermelon better. It's really good. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Uthana Haynes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but not practical and not easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Julie hoops

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Used this on a pumpkin during a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used this on a pumpkin during a halloween party and it was a lot of fun. Pretty easy to install, no leaking. Try to place it on a flat surface as close to the bottom of the pumpkin/watermelon as possible, so that the tap stays below the liquid level. Otherwise, you will just have to tilt it to get last half of the beverage out.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for college kids around their birthdays or the holidays. Good gag gift or white elephant gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for college kids around their birthdays or the holidays. Good gag gift or white elephant gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kauffmann

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: This product was the hit of the party. Easy to ensemble and very sturdy. Beware of the little internal o-ring, it could easily get lost. Make sure fully blend any solids that might pass through this product. Small pieces tend to get stuck , causing you take it apart. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Memnon

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend mixes Arizona fruit punch in the watermelon with the watermelon juice and pieces inside and it's the bomb. Seriously delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Works on pumpkins too.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a Harvest party on a pumpkin. It worked great. The handle can be turned around so the watermelon doesn't show. It was quick, easy, and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Yell07

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make a pumpkin beer keg for Halloween - it was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: G4orce

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun idea, but this tap leaked as soon as we filled the watermelon with liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: The watermelon keg is a great addition to our summer parties
customer_reviews.text: The watermelon keg is a great addition to our summer parties! The only problem is it can clog up. To prevent this you must strain the juice well. For large parities or small watermelons we filled with shots.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Schuld

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it. The adults adore it
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. The adults adore it. I dig it for the easy clean up, but I'm pretty sure I'll loose the parts after one use... almost disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Bukks

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: gets clogged easily but a fun idea for a party
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Problem free shipping and delivered in excellent condition. Minor leaks; however, good profit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Guerriero

customer_reviews.title: But easy to install and does work
customer_reviews.text: It leaks from the nozzle if you don't turn it to the side after you use it. But easy to install and does work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well and sealed without drips. Well, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and sealed without drips. Well, the spout may have dripped a bit, but all of them do. I mean where it seals to the watermelon. No leaks there. Get a big watermelon so you don't have to refill it every 20 minutes. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rick Masters

customer_reviews.title: Great bbq Statement
customer_reviews.text: Great for bbq's minimal clean up afterwards! Only thing you need to ensure the watermelon is cleaned out thoroughly, it could get pieces of the water melon stuck in the spout in which the flow blocked. Otherwise great product it doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: but it clogs far too easy..
customer_reviews.text: Its okay...but it clogs far too easy...anything larger then juice will clog it...and then you have a mess
customer_reviews.author: Bruce P. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as the video showed. After all the work, it was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a working tap for a pumpkin/watermelon. What more could one want?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kit is great and fit in the watermelon well
customer_reviews.text: The kit is great and fit in the watermelon well. My problem was that I did not cut enough of the bottom off to make it level and so a big gust of wind blew it over........UGH....all of my hard work spilled.
customer_reviews.author: NormaS

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and It was leaking. Amazon took it back
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: I liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot. But when I put it away I realized I for got a part! My mistake!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Sue Hermes

customer_reviews.title: Class of 82!
customer_reviews.text: We were the hit of the outdoor HS reunion with this!
customer_reviews.author: karen m semos

customer_reviews.title: Delivered as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This performed just as advertised-I picked an appropriate watermelon (got some interesting looks as I picked out the watermelon most likely to stand up-I still had to trim the bottom just a bit), scooped it out, leaving 2"s of watermelon to prevent leaking, cored it with the enclosed tool and fastened the tap. I seemed sangria from it-it did fine, and impressed the partygoers.
customer_reviews.author: LindaPK

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but not in practice.
customer_reviews.text: I tried it. It tended to stop up and I couldn't get it to not leak from where it screws into the watermelon.
customer_reviews.author: P. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much fun ~ quite the center piece of a table! Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lady B

customer_reviews.title: i haven't used it yet, but perhaps i'll update ...
customer_reviews.text: i haven't used it yet, but perhaps i'll update this when I do. just looking at the pictures though, it's quite badass.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Bananas

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive advertising
customer_reviews.text: From the picture, it looks like you just insert the handle and watermelon juice comes out. Turns out you have to gut the watermelon, add water, blend it, then strain it and pour it back in the watermelon.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Stiern

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product!
customer_reviews.text: BIG hit for our summer themed party. Worked very well - no leakage at all. The only "problem" is that seedless watermelons are pretty small so we had to keep refilling. But it was a fun addition to the party.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cortina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It works wonder for me. I followed the instruction. After I took the watermelon fruit out, then I use a blender for juicing. Before I pour it back into the keg, I strained the pulp. There ya, go. I added vodka and ice. Put the juice back into the keg and It pour nice out of tap.
customer_reviews.author: Fifthkiss

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, FUN
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME, FUN, COOL, EASY, AND, ..DID I MENSION?? EASY, COOL, FUN, AND AWESOME!!! Quick -n- Easy Drink Spectacular Showcase. Fill It again & again. I LOVE IT!! Buy This Shit!!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier D Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Watermelon Daquiri Time!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well - exactly as advertised. It's not metal, so don't expect it to be super sturdy, but it's still plenty strong. The tap is big enough for blended watermelon to pour through. If you do make watermelon daquiris I'd recommend straining out the pulp though. I used this for about 10 hours without any issues except for 2 times when it got clogged and we had to use pressurized air to clear it. Not a big deal, but with the pulp strained out this would work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Mcrae

customer_reviews.title: Watermelon Keg Tapping Kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it with a little hesitent on the reviews. I am so Happy I bought it anyway and love it!!! We used it and it was a hit. What a great idea. I will also use it with a pumpkin Just make sure you use a strainer for the watermelon then it will not clog up. We didn't had any problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Wheeler Sr.

customer_reviews.title: My first time to use it went great. I chose poorly on recipe but the spigot ...
customer_reviews.text: My first time to use it went great. I chose poorly on recipe but the spigot worked great. I did not have any leaks. I filtered the watermelon juice so there would be no clogs to deal with. After it was over I was able to clean it in soapy water. Keep an eye on the gaskets. You do not want to lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Jared E

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use at the yacht club as a gift. Everyone loves this! So far we have used with vodka, lemonade, and tea depending on the occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A party hit!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install! It comes with a tool for cutting the perfect size hole for spout. I used that same tool to cut a hole in the "lid" and shoved a cork in for a handle, for refilling. No clogging or dripping! Cute idea!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Woofter

customer_reviews.title: even after puree'd it gets clogged. made of cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: even after puree'd it gets clogged. made of cheap plastic too. used it once and threw it out after attempting second time w/ same results. junk
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit. The hardest part was finding a big enough watermelon. The product worked just as intended. There were only a few drips out of the spout over the course of the night as far as leaking. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, put it through the dishwasher and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, put it through the dishwasher and all the chrome fell off. Don't expect it to hold up well long term either as it is entirely plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It was a hit at our party. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The watermelon keg tap kit arrived quickly and I was able to use it right away. It was just as simple to use as it looked. Everyone loved the whimsical vibe it gave to the party!
customer_reviews.author: MNC

customer_reviews.title: It works great just make sure to strain the liquid and use ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great just make sure to strain the liquid and use the tool that goes with it. Also, use big watermelons so it'll look great. One star less because the instruction was not clear on how to assemble it. I figured it out eventually by trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: It made for a fun party and will use it again
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. It made for a fun party and will use it again.
customer_reviews.author: EJL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool! I would give 5 starts but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool! I would give 5 starts but the entire thing is plastic, and I am not sure how long the tap will last.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Guests loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun, used it in a special promotion that featured a fresh watermelon drink and the guests loved it.It worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: XJGlenn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Meh! A little gimmicky. Drips all over the place. Ill do it again for outside event
customer_reviews.author: Hatty

customer_reviews.title: I have used this a few times, it's always ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a few times, it's always a hit! The tap gets clogged a bit towards the ends but with any pulp type beverage I would think that would happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a big hit at an outdoor party on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a big hit at an outdoor party on a lake. Served a watermelon Margarita out of a large watermelon.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used to make a pumpkin keg for Halloween. Cleaned out the inside and poured Cider into it, minimal leakage.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. Not 5 stars because it will clog if you don't remove the pulp.
customer_reviews.author: Pat McGoin

customer_reviews.title: For your next backyard party
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Unique and fun, tasty cocktails, and everyone will remember your party!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great. Directions and tools are great. The tap did clog and it was difficult to unclog. Wound up scooping it from the top with a ladle. Maybe if the watermelon juice was puréed more, it wouldn't clog as much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for party.
customer_reviews.text: We used it on 4th of July and everyone enjoyed their drinks.
customer_reviews.author: PSILove U

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just put your liquid through a strainer ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just put your liquid through a strainer or cheesecloth to remove pulp and it will not stop up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: This was a GREAT BIG Hit at our outing...
customer_reviews.text: This was a GREAT BIG Hit at our family outing. The tapping kit worked perfect. Can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it works.
customer_reviews.text: Fun accessory for a get together at the pool or lake.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Stewart Carr

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine. We made the mistake of not straining the ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine. We made the mistake of not straining the watermelon and we clogged the spigot. Had we followed ALL the directions, we would have been fine. Glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Swanson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this with a pumpkin. I take back my earlier review. The coring tool works great! I think my bf really just wanted to use his power drill. The flow from the tap isn't super fast but that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: M. Loprieno

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to happen to a watermelon since...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool product. Great for parties though out door may be more so. If you like presentation, guests will not stop talking about this method of serving drinks. Only downside is that you must pay attention to how you install and not over tighten the tap. A watermelon is fragile enough to damage if you over tighten. Plus after a little while, tends to drip under the tap mount a little. I'm considering trying this on a pumpkin next Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: MarkSonic

customer_reviews.title: but am hearing great reviews so
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift, but am hearing great reviews so far
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. May need some tweaking to stop small leaks. Still good though.
customer_reviews.text: This was a really fun thing to do at our family party. It was certainly impressive. I was surprised how easy it was to install in the melon! The only issue, and the reason for the four star rating, is that it leaked at the connection near the spout. Next time, I'll put plumbers tape on it to see if that solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: misspossible

customer_reviews.title: Some pulp clogs
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, except the drink had watermelon pulp in it, which eventually clogged the tap.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Watermelon Keg!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly! My watermelon keg was a hit! Easy to use. Just added a bottle of vodka to the watermelon juice and some mint. I froze one cup of juice ahead of time as well to help keep the drink inside cold. Prepared it the day before and refrigerated the watermelon and juice. Poured it all together once my guests arrived. Yum!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanee Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it just throw your keg away. Can't wait to use on a pumpkin
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Bentle

customer_reviews.title: Works for a night, but don't use over carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Leaked slightly and got clogged by minuscule pieces of watermelon easily. Probably needs a screen or something. I mean it worked for the party, but I don't think I'd use it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Myke Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Great watermelon tap
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at the party. Great watermelon tap. It is a little cheaply made but it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: S. Price

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great party accessory...I bought 3 of them and there are lots of ideas on Internet on what fruit etc you can do with this
customer_reviews.author: Mari Willey

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: We had lots of fun with this on July 4th at a party we gave.

customer_reviews.title: Star of the party!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is soooo cool! I used it the day I got it for a party we had, and everyone loved it! Kids and adults alike. It was definitely a hit! And it worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna S

customer_reviews.title: Very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it twice and it works as advertised. No complaints.

customer_reviews.title: No leaks and was fun for the party
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in a pumpkin for Halloween! No leaks and was fun for the party. Filled it with hard cider from Two Towns cider.

customer_reviews.title: Not so cool
customer_reviews.text: Too much work, I bought it cause it cause I thought it will make my job easier but nope.
customer_reviews.author: Faro

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What You Think
customer_reviews.text: If you want to enjoy "adult" beverages in a festive watermelon or pumpkin, this is what you need. It works as advertised and was well worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Nick A Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Not a winner
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but terribly small. Got this for a $20 swap gift, but was embarrassed to give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Helen In The Burgh

product_meta.title: Final Touch Watermelon Keg Tapping Kit with Coring Tool
product_meta.description:
Turn watermelons or other fruits into a drink dispenser! Use this kit to turn an everyday watermelon or pumpkin into a drink-dispensing keg. You'll be a hit at barbecues, picnics and other occasions. This shank and faucet combo is easily installed into a standard, hollowed-out watermelon or pumpkin and will provide hassle-free dispensing for all your premium cocktail creations.

 * Turns watermelons or pumpkins into a drink-dispensing keg
 * Shank and faucet combo makes it easy to insert into any hollowed-out watermelon or pumpkin
 * Includes watermelon keg tap, coring tool & instructions with recipe
feature_bullets: Not that crafty? No problem! We've made tapping a watermelon surprisingly easy. The most difficult step is walking away, so your guests can pour.
Turn watermelons or other fruits into a drink dispenser

Use this kit to turn an everyday watermelon or pumpkin into a drinkdispensing keg. Great at barbecues, picnics and other occasions. This shank and faucet combo is easily installed into a standard, hollowedout watermelon or pumpkin and will provide hassle-free dispensing for all your premium cocktail creations.

Four Easy Steps: (1) Slice to keep the melon standing straight (optional). (2) Cut a lid from the top, scoop clean and set fruit innards aside. (3) Use the included coring tool to make a hole, insert the shank and attach the faucet. (4) Fill the melon with your beverage of choice and enjoy.

Includes: watermelon keg tap, coring tool, instructions & recipe | Dimensions: Tap: 6.7" H x 2.3" W x 5.1" D (17cm H x 5.8cm W x 13cm D) Coring Tool: 8" H x 0.6" W (20.2cm H x 1.5cm W)" | Material: Plastic (BPA-free) | Washing: Hand wash
